QuestData.Title: Jailbreak
QuestData.Description: Without healing, your friend Taylor will die. My village is just east of here, in the middle of the large lake.$B$BI will take Taylor myself, but the fighting is most dangerous in that direction.$B$BI need you to help clear a path through the hozen, so that I may run safely into my village.$B$BCan you do this?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. Because of you, we were able to make it here safely.
